section_title: OVERVIEW OF INSTITUTIONS, MECHANISMS AND ARRANGEMENTS UNDER THE CONVENTION:
sentences: On Tuesday, 12 November, Co-Chair Runge-Metzger identified the state of play under the Convention as 'a natural entry point' into discussions under both ADP workstreams.
The Secretariat presented the overview (FCCC/ADP/2013/INF.2), noting an online interface for future reference.
